long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kaggle Plus is a browser extension that visualizes the leaderboard of a Kaggle competition. It allows users to view the competition rankings in a more convenient and informative way. By installing Kaggle Plus, users can easily track their progress and compare their performance with other participants. The extension provides additional features such as displaying bar charts for the leaderboard and supporting dark themes. If youâ€™re a Kaggle enthusiast, Kaggle Plus can enhance your experience and help you stay up-to-date with the latest competition standings. Feel free to explore it and enjoy the benefits!
